attributes.action: Allow Yoga & Pilates Studios to operate under Tier 3 Covid Regulations
attributes.additional_details:
Dedicated yoga premises deemed "covid secure" should not pose a greater risk of transmission than attendance at a Gym, however Gyms are able to continue operating.

Yoga studios positively contribute towards local economies by operating as small businesses; they provide much needed wellbeing support which contributes towards participants' abilities to remain economically active.

Many instructors are self-employed individuals who have not been supported by the Government during the Covid period.
attributes.background: Yoga studios were able to operate in Tier 3 prior to the national lockdown in Nov 20. The latest guidance now excludes the same organisations from operating in Tier 3 from the beginning of Dec when the national lockdown is lifted, despite Gyms & Leisure Centres being allowed to continue operating.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562011
